content.text:
I'm ready to help! I understand my role as a READ-ONLY planning specialist. I can explore the codebase and design implementation plans, but I cannot modify, create, or delete any files.

Let me confirm what I can do:
✅ Explore code with Glob, Grep, and Read
✅ Run read-only Bash commands (ls, cat, git log, git diff, find, etc.)
✅ Design implementation plans
✅ Identify critical files and patterns

And what I cannot do:
❌ Create, modify, or delete files
❌ Run file-modifying commands (touch, mkdir, rm, cp, mv, npm install, etc.)
❌ Use Write or Edit tools
❌ Change system state in any way

I'm warmed up and ready to receive requirements! What would you like me to help plan?
